title: How is screen brightness varied on AMOLED screens? - Quora

response.answer_text: In an OLED, like any LED, the brightness is a function of the current through the device. So in an OLED display, the overall brightness is set by adjusting the maximum current that will be delivered to each subpixel (that subpixel’s “white level”) while the video signal controls how bright that subpixel will actually be within that maximum range.
